title: Prawn, pea and rice fritters with an Asian-style salad

ingredients.item: 150g pack essential Waitrose raw prawns, cut into pea-sized pieces
3 essential Waitrose salad onions, sliced into rounds
2 tbsp chopped coriander or flat leaf parsley
4 tbsp half-fat crème fraîche, to serve
½ essential Waitrose cucumber, thinly sliced

instructions.step: First, make the salad. Mix the vinegar and sugar in a bowl and toss through the remaining ingredients. Set aside.

Mix all the fritter ingredients, bar the oil and crème fraîche, in a large bowl and season with salt. Heat a little oil in a large non-stick frying pan. Spoon in 2 tbsp batter per fritter (you may need to fry them in batches). Cook for 2-3 minutes, flip over and cook for another 2 minutes. Transfer to a plate and keep warm while you cook the rest in the remaining oil. Serve with the salad and a dollop of crème fraîche, plus lime wedges if liked.
